name: Sims-Like Building System Unity Template Project
name_original: Sims-Like Building System Unity Template Project
description:
House Building System in Unity project Template 

Grab it at:

https://courses.sunnyvalleystudio.com/p/sims-like-house-building-system-project-...

Camera movement:

  • WSAD/Arrows = movement
  • Q and E = rotation
  • scroll wheel = zoom

Placement System:

  • Select from the UI an object that you want to place
  • Click LMB and place / drag to place more objects (depends on the object)
  • Doors and Windows can only be placed 
  • [white square] = object needs to be placed near wall
  • to rotate objects use comma "," and dot "." keys
  • To remove object start placing it and hold Right Ctrl to enter Removing mode (red outline around the screen)
  • Undo button is available at times on the left side of the screen
  • MOVE mode is the first icon in UI. You can only move furniture objets
